languages.text: {n}Последний из Космических волков испускает дух — отвага и ярость не в силах одолеть судьбу, нити которой соткали ваше предназначение. Пролитая кровь космодесантников застилает собой поле битвы, медленно стекаясь в нечестивые узоры и богохульные руны.{/n}

{n}The last of the Space Wolves is slain. Courage and fury are not enough to defeat fate, from whose threads your purpose is woven. The Space Marines' spilt blood covers the battlefield, slowly flowing together to form unholy patterns and blasphemous runes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Последний из Космических волков испускает дух — отвага и ярость не в силах одолеть судьбу, нити которой соткали ваше предназначение. Пролитая кровь космодесантников застилает собой поле битвы, медленно стекаясь в нечестивые узоры и богохульные руны.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The last of the Space Wolves is slain. Courage and fury aren't enough to defeat fate, from whose threads your purpose is woven. The space marines' spilt blood covers the battlefield, slowly flowing together to form unholy patterns and blasphemous runes.{/n}

{n}The last of the Space Wolves is slain. Courage and fury aren't enough to defeat fate, from whose threads your purpose is woven. The space marines' spilt blood covers the battlefield, slowly flowing together to form unholy patterns and blasphemous runes.{/n}

{n}The last of the Space Wolves is slain. Courage and fury aren't enough to defeat fate, from whose threads your purpose is woven. The space marines' spilt blood covers the battlefield, slowly flowing together to form unholy patterns and blasphemous runes.{/n}

{n}The last of the Space Wolves is slain. Courage and fury aren't enough to defeat fate, from whose threads your purpose is woven. The space marines' spilt blood covers the battlefield, slowly flowing together to form unholy patterns and blasphemous runes.{/n}

{n}The last of the Space Wolves is slain. Courage and fury are not enough to defeat fate, from whose threads your purpose is woven. The Space Marines' spilt blood covers the battlefield, slowly flowing together to form unholy patterns and blasphemous runes.{/n}

{n}The last of the Space Wolves is slain. Courage and fury are not enough to defeat fate, from whose threads your purpose is woven. The Space Marines' spilt blood covers the battlefield, slowly flowing together to form unholy patterns and blasphemous runes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}最后的太空野狼也倒在了地上。即便是他们的勇气与愤怒，也不足以战胜无数丝线编制而成的命运。整个战场上洒满了星际战士的鲜血，鲜血汇聚在一起，慢慢组成了邪恶的图案与亵渎神灵的印记。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The last of the Space Wolves is slain. Courage and fury are not enough to defeat fate, from whose threads your purpose is woven. The Space Marines' spilt blood covers the battlefield, slowly flowing together to form unholy patterns and blasphemous runes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}最后的太空野狼也倒在了地上。即便是他们的勇气与愤怒，也不足以战胜无数丝线编制而成的命运。整个战场上洒满了星际战士的鲜血，鲜血汇聚在一起，慢慢组成了邪恶的图案与亵渎神灵的印记。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der letzte der Space Wolves ist tot. Mut und Zorn reichen nicht aus, um das Schicksal zu besiegen, aus dessen Fäden unser Zweck gewoben ist. Das vergossene Blut der Space Marines bedeckt das Schlachtfeld, fließt langsam zusammen und bildet dabei unheilige Muster und blasphemische Runen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The last of the Space Wolves is slain. Courage and fury are not enough to defeat fate, from whose threads your purpose is woven. The Space Marines' spilt blood covers the battlefield, slowly flowing together to form unholy patterns and blasphemous runes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der letzte der Space Wolves ist tot. Mut und Zorn reichen nicht aus, um das Schicksal zu besiegen, aus dessen Fäden unser Zweck gewoben ist. Das vergossene Blut der Space Marines bedeckt das Schlachtfeld, fließt langsam zusammen und bildet dabei unheilige Muster und blasphemische Runen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El último Lobo Espacial se desploma sin vida. El coraje y la furia no bastan para luchar contra el destino, con cuyos hilos se ha tejido tu propósito. La sangre derramada de los marines espaciales cubre el campo de batalla, fluyendo lentamente hasta trazar símbolos impíos y runas blasfemas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The last of the Space Wolves is slain. Courage and fury are not enough to defeat fate, from whose threads your purpose is woven. The Space Marines' spilt blood covers the battlefield, slowly flowing together to form unholy patterns and blasphemous runes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El último Lobo Espacial se desploma sin vida. El coraje y la furia no bastan para luchar contra el destino, con cuyos hilos se ha tejido tu propósito. La sangre derramada de los marines espaciales cubre el campo de batalla, fluyendo lentamente hasta trazar símbolos impíos y runas blasfemas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le dernier des Space Wolves a péri. Le courage et la fureur ne sont pas de taille face au destin, qui a lui-même tissé votre voie. Le sang des Loups recouvre peu à peu le champ de bataille en formant des motifs impies et des runes blasphématoires.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The last of the Space Wolves is slain. Courage and fury are not enough to defeat fate, from whose threads your purpose is woven. The Space Marines' spilt blood covers the battlefield, slowly flowing together to form unholy patterns and blasphemous runes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le dernier des Space Wolves a péri. Le courage et la fureur ne sont pas de taille face au destin, qui a lui-même tissé votre voie. Le sang des Loups recouvre peu à peu le champ de bataille en formant des motifs impies et des runes blasphématoires.{/n}

languages.text: {n}最後のスペースウルフが殺された。勇気と怒りだけでは、自身の目的が編み込まれた運命に打ち勝つことはできない。スペースマリーンが流した血は戦場を覆い、ゆっくりと流れて不浄な模様と冒涜的なルーンを形成した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The last of the Space Wolves is slain. Courage and fury are not enough to defeat fate, from whose threads your purpose is woven. The Space Marines' spilt blood covers the battlefield, slowly flowing together to form unholy patterns and blasphemous runes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}最後のスペースウルフが殺された。勇気と怒りだけでは、自身の目的が編み込まれた運命に打ち勝つことはできない。スペースマリーンが流した血は戦場を覆い、ゆっくりと流れて不浄な模様と冒涜的なルーンを形成した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Son Uzay Kurdu da katledildi. Cesaret ve hiddet, kaderi alt etmeye yetmez. Zira senin gayenin ağları, kaderden örüldü. Uzay Piyadeleri'nin dökülen kanı; savaş alanını kaplıyor, yavaşça akarak günahkâr motifler ve kâfirce rünler oluşturuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The last of the Space Wolves is slain. Courage and fury are not enough to defeat fate, from whose threads your purpose is woven. The Space Marines' spilt blood covers the battlefield, slowly flowing together to form unholy patterns and blasphemous runes.{/n}
